sentences.en: Also, we do the job of tinplate printing , molding, lid making and can making.
sentences.cn: 厂内设有印铁、制罐 、 制盖 、 制模等车间.

sentences.en: Indian Railway paint and tinplate production sheared.
sentences.cn: 生产印铁涂料和马口铁剪切.

sentences.en: Indian railways , tinplate and galvanized iron products ( production processing wholesale and retail ) ( limited branch ).
sentences.cn: 印铁, 马口铁制品及马口铁 ( 生产加工批发零售 ) ( 限分支机构 ).

sentences.en: It is widely used in printing of metal parts like AL sheets, tinplate, chrome iron, AL plates.
sentences.cn: 产品广泛被用于各种金属、铝板、马口铁、铬铁、铝片等材质产品上的工艺印刷。

sentences.en: Modern materials, including stainless steel and plastics, have replaced tinplate in many common applications.
sentences.cn: 现在所用的不锈钢和塑料的材料已经逐步代替镀锡钢板而被普遍使用.
我司主要从事马口铁生产。

sentences.en: Surface material: glass outer lid, white tinplate.
sentences.cn: 外壳材料: 白色烤瓷外壳,玻璃顶盖.

sentences.en: The electrolytic tinplate production line adopt Fuluositan handicraft, sacrificing a positive electrode and an insoluble anode.
sentences.cn: 电镀锡板生产线采用弗洛斯坦工艺, 牺牲阳极及辅助不溶性阳极技术.

sentences.en: The instrument for automatically determinig tin coating weight of tinplate hasbeen developed.
sentences.cn: 根据电解剥离原理,研制出马口铁镀锡量自动测量仪.

sentences.en: The lightness difference method was employed to characterize quantitatively the high temperature oxidation on the tinplate.
sentences.cn: 采用明度差法表征镀锡薄钢板表面的高温氧化产物的量.

sentences.en: The material may select materials and so on copper, iron, zinc base alloy, tinplate, terne metal.
sentences.cn: 材料可选用铜 、 铁 、 锌合金 、 马口铁 、 铅锡合金等材料.
制罐; 马口铁加工制造;马口铁销售.
